name: Navigation Menu
description: Displays a navigation menu, suitable to be placed in the header.

name: Hero Header
description: Containing a sliding hero section where you can display 5 hero images highlighting the purpose of the site.

name: Image Gallery
description: Containing a maximum of 10 images.

name: List
description: List items with images, header text, and short descriptions.

name: Contact Form
description: A form for users to submit inquiries or messages.

name: Footer
description: The bottom section of the website containing copyright information, links, and other details.

name: Testimonials
description: A section displaying customer testimonials with images and comments.

name: Search Bar
description: A field that allows users to search for content within the website.

name: Slider
description: A dynamic component for showcasing multiple pieces of content, such as images or promotions.

name: Video Player
description: An embedded player for playing videos on the website.

name: Call to Action (CTA) Button
description: A button designed to encourage users to take a specific action, such as making a purchase or signing up.

name: Countdown Timer
description: A timer that counts down to a specific date or event, creating a sense of urgency.

name: Social Media Icons
description: Icons linking to the website's social media profiles for easy sharing and engagement.

name: FAQ Section
description: Frequently Asked Questions with answers to common queries.

name: Blog Post List
description: A section displaying a list of blog posts with titles, images, and summaries.

name: Login Form
description: A form for users to log in to their accounts.

name: Subscription Box
description: A box allowing users to subscribe to newsletters or updates.

name: Progress Bar
description: A visual representation of the progress of a task or process.

name: Interactive Map
description: A map that users can interact with, displaying locations or relevant information.

name: Accordion
description: A collapsible content section that allows users to expand or collapse information as needed.

name: Product Carousel
description: A carousel displaying a selection of products with images and brief descriptions.

name: Rating and Reviews
description: User-generated ratings and reviews for products or services.

name: Progressive Web App (PWA) Features
description: Incorporating PWA features for enhanced user experience, such as offline functionality and push notifications.

name: Notification Bar
description: A bar displaying important notifications or alerts to users.

name: Data Tables
description: Tables displaying organized data with sorting and filtering options.

name: Mega Menu
description: An expanded menu with multiple levels and rich content.

name: Animated Icons
description: Icons with animated effects to enhance visual appeal.

name: Progressive Loading
description: A technique for loading content progressively as the user scrolls, improving page load times.

name: Error 404 Page
description: A custom page displayed when users encounter a 404 error, providing helpful navigation or suggestions.

name: Contact Information
description: Clear display of contact details, including address, phone number, and email.

name: Polls and Surveys
description: Interactive polls or surveys to gather user feedback.

name: Event Calendar
description: A calendar displaying upcoming events with details and registration options.

name: Animated Background
description: A visually appealing animated background for specific sections of the website.

name: Tabbed Content
description: Content organized into tabs for easy navigation and presentation.

name: Lead Capture Form
description: A form designed to capture visitor information for lead generation purposes.

name: Special Offers Banner
description: A banner highlighting special offers or promotions with a call to action.

name: Customer Success Stories
description: Showcasing success stories or case studies of satisfied customers.

name: Interactive Infographic
description: An engaging and interactive infographic presenting key information visually.

name: Dynamic Pricing Table
description: A pricing table that dynamically updates based on user selections or customization options.

name: Live Chat Support
description: A live chat feature for real-time customer support and assistance.

name: Comparison Table
description: A table comparing different product or service features to aid decision-making.

name: Newsletter Signup Popup
description: A popup encouraging visitors to subscribe to the newsletter for updates and offers.

name: Interactive Quiz
description: An interactive quiz to engage visitors and gather insights about their preferences.

name: Product Showcase Gallery
description: A gallery featuring a visually appealing display of key products or services.

name: Downloadable Resources Section
description: A section providing downloadable resources such as whitepapers, guides, or brochures.

name: Social Proof Widget
description: A widget displaying social proof elements, such as recent purchases or testimonials.

name: Brand Partnerships Section
description: Highlighting partnerships with other brands or organizations for credibility.

name: Interactive Product Demo
description: An interactive demonstration of a product's features and functionalities.

name: Upsell Section
description: A section suggesting complementary products or upgrades to encourage additional purchases.

name: Loyalty Program Information
description: Details about a customer loyalty program, including rewards and benefits.

name: Interactive User Reviews
description: User reviews presented in an interactive format, allowing sorting and filtering.

name: Product Availability Checker
description: A tool for users to check the availability of products in their location.

name: Dynamic Call to Action (CTA)
description: A CTA that dynamically changes based on user behavior or preferences.

name: Interactive Tour
description: An interactive tour guiding users through key features or offerings.

name: Limited-Time Offer Countdown
description: A countdown timer for a limited-time promotional offer.

name: User-generated Content Feed
description: A feed displaying content generated by users, such as photos or testimonials.

name: Customization Tool
description: A tool allowing users to customize products or services before making a purchase.

name: Interactive Price Calculator
description: A calculator that dynamically calculates the price based on user inputs and selections.

name: Mobile App Download Section
description: Section promoting the download of the company's mobile app with app store links.

name: Virtual Event Platform Integration
description: Integration with a virtual event platform for hosting online events and webinars.

name: Product Warranty Information
description: Details about product warranties, terms, and conditions.

name: Interactive 360-Degree Product View
description: An interactive view allowing users to explore products from all angles.

name: Customer Feedback Form
description: A form for collecting feedback from customers to improve products or services.

name: Promotional Video Section
description: A section featuring a promotional video highlighting key aspects of the business.

name: Interactive Social Media Feed
description: An embedded feed displaying the latest posts from the company's social media accounts.

name: Product Highlight Carousel
description: A carousel showcasing highlighted products with key features and benefits.

name: Interactive Financial Calculator
description: A calculator helping users estimate financial aspects, such as savings or ROI.
